channel.title: Authors on Elizabeth Luh
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Elizabeth Luh

item.description:
I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at the University of Houston. I am primarily interested in Applied Microeconomics with a focus on labor economics, public economics, and economics of crime. My current research is focused on identifying and measuring racial bias in law enforcement.

I will be attending the 2020 ASSA meeting in San Diego between January 2nd - 5th.
